column2: Warriors serving with your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] have sent word to inform you that they have recently observed a marked improvement in [From.GetHerHis] military leadership abilities.

Rumors reach you regarding [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], the mercenary. You always knew him as a coward, but now the word is that [From.GetSheHe] has been cured of [From.GetHerHis] shameful fear of battle.
Life as a mercenary seems to have hardened your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Words of [From.GetHerHis] courage in battle reach you every so often.
It is said that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has become known as a very energetic and tenacious mercenary leader.

People say that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has changed since [From.GetSheHe] took up leadership of [From.GetHerHis] mercenary band. [From.GetSheHeCap] now rarely shows the kindness to others that [From.GetSheHe] used to be known for.
It is said that [From.GetHerHis] time as a mercenary leader has changed the outlook of your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] no longer shows the same humble spirit as before.
During [From.GetHerHis] time as a mercenary leader, your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has become quite famed for [From.GetHerHis] taste for lustful escapades.
It is said that the mercenaries who serve in your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s band all have come to fear [From.GetHerHis] frequent outbursts of rage.
Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has gained a reputation as a very cruel mercenary leader.
News reach you that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has fought a glorious battle against [FromFrom.GetTitledName].

Mercenary leaders frequently have to deal with people of foreign cultures and religions. Now people are saying that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has developed a particular interest in the [merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName] ways.
You receive news that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has converted to the [merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName] faith.
Your [eloper.GetSonDaughter] [eloper.GetFirstName] has eloped with the notorious mercenary [From.GetFirstName].
[eloper.GetFirstName] has eloped with the notorious mercenary [From.GetFirstName].
[eloper.GetTitledName] has eloped with the notorious mercenary [From.GetTitledName].
Apparently there was a fight between your son and the mercenary [From.GetDynName]. As luck would have it, no one came to harm.
Apparently your son was in a violent fight with his employer's son. It seems that no one came to harm, however.
Apparently there was a fight between your son and the mercenary [From.GetDynName]. Your son was wounded.
Apparently your son [From.GetFirstName] was in a violent fight with his employer's son, who was lightly injured.
Apparently there was a fight between your son and the mercenary [From.GetDynName]. Your son was maimed in the fight.
Apparently your son [From.GetFirstName] was in a violent fight with his employer's son, who was maimed.
New reach you that your son has been killed in a fight with the mercenary [From.GetDynName].
Apparently your son [From.GetFirstName] was in a violent fight with his employer's son, who was killed.
That mercenary band that you hired a while back seems to still be in the region.... maybe you should invite the commander to a small feast?
[From.GetDynName] came to feast with you and you found that you have much in common.
[From.GetTitledName] refused to come and feast with you.
It is said that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has turned into a very experienced mercenary commander.
You have heard interesting rumors at court about your father's past as a mercenary commander.
My ward, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is asking me about [From.GetHerHis] father's past as a mercenary.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is asking me about my past as a mercenary.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] stayed up late into the night, and [From.GetSheHe] told me many stories of my father's past adventures.
[From.GetFirstName] refused to tell me anything.
[From.GetFirstName] has spent his hard earned wealth on attracting and recruiting more soldiers for his mercenary band.
[From.GetFirstName] has spent his hard earned wealth on carousing with his men, wasting it on spirits and women
There is no substitute for experience!
Finally, my [GetFromRelation] is a real [From.GetManWoman]!
[From.GetHerHisCap] deeds honor the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty!
A fine example to all!
How this world changes [From.GetMenWomen].
A predictable effect of [From.GetHerHis] station, surely.
Perhaps it was only to be expected.
I'm sure they deserve it.
People had best not get in [From.GetHerHis] way.
[From.GetSheHeCap] measures [From.GetHerselfHimself] against the great!
So [From.GetSheHe] finds [merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName]s interesting?
So [From.GetSheHe] worships [merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now?
The [GetRootFromInsult]!
I am glad it ended well.
I am not pleased.
Woe!
Better luck next time!
That's my boy!
I will have my revenge, I swear it!
Yes, I think I will!
A new friend, maybe I should give [From.GetHerHim] some land...
Who does [From.GetSheHe] think [From.GetSheHe] is?
That is good to hear.
I should ask my guardian [Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] about it.
Ah, do I have stories for [From.GetHerHim]...
Fascinating!
But why?
A good investment I hope.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has increased [From.GetHerHis] army size by §G5%§!
A good family tradition.
No, mercenaries are best kept at a proper distance.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is better off not knowing.
